name: Fire Emblem Three Houses: The Card Game
name_original: Fire Emblem Three Houses: The Card Game
description:
Fire Emblem Three Houses: The Card Game is a simple card game about exploiting the weapon triangles to achieve victory. 

Swords beat axes, axes beat lances, lances beat swords. 

Magic beats bows, bows beat gauntlets, gauntlets beat magic.

Controls

  • Click to select card
  • Escape to bring up music options menu
